name: places/ChIJPT9HMFFYwokRyRKBmQaRDN0
adrFormatAddress: 719 9th Ave #49, New York, NY 10019-7365, USA

editorialSummary.text: Basic convenience store with a deli counter serving made-to-order breakfast & lunch sandwiches.

originalText.text:
One time the deli manager was really rude and I didn't come back for months. This time, I'm not coming back at all.

I asked for pan fried tuna with cheddar cheese. I got a non pan fried tuna and American cheese. Hey, I could have gone as cross the street to the Dollar tree and got that for $2 instead of paying $10 for this disaster. See pictures.

I called to speak to the person who is very nice and has worked there for many years and instead of her getting on the phone, a very aggressive service deli manager with me, a real woman tried to get into the ring with me.

I normally have never asked for a credit, I'm in there everyday, and I spent thousands a month. I thought maybe she would credit me for next time, and that would be the end of it.

Not only with this guy not credit me, but apparently everything was my fault, not his.

I've never in my life had anyone in the restaurant business speak to me in that manner. He said we had the conversation before and it's not worth his time to mess up his pan with the tuna, almost impossible to believe, but it's on a recorded call. Yep, he said it. I would hate to inconvenience you for 30 seconds to clean a pan for a CUSTOMER.
Does this place even have an owner? I'll send you the audio recording if you'd like.

Last I knew there was an owner that had to Florida. Died shortly after getting an MNRA vaccine. That's what a guy at the service deli told me.

Service deli said that my food sat for 2 hours and I should come in right away, (again no culpability on his part). This deli makes you wait a minimum of 30 minutes for pickup, but today it was an hour. I came in 15 minutes after and he even decided to argue with me on that and said that I came in 22 minutes after the hour, really? Again, who doesn't put a customer first and goes into the ring with a woman like this? A misogynistic woman hater, that's who.

The concept of the customer always being correct is not something that is understood here, and if you're a female, good luck.

The attitude of the service manager, David, explains to me why the women look exhausted.

I feel bad for these women. They work very hard. All the women are in the cashier section, all the men are in the deli. The women look completely miserable, the men look happy.

I rest my pen.

originalText.text: We went here a few years back we’re from Ohio. It is still the best sub that me and my wife has ever had from here to there. Wish we could get one anytime we would want one but nowhere near New York.

text.text: We went here a few years back we’re from Ohio. It is still the best sub that me and my wife has ever had from here to there. Wish we could get one anytime we would want one but nowhere near New York.

originalText.text:
If looking for a location with great sandwich choices that don't skimp & portions, look no further than 7 Brothers. Decent prices for the area too.

Update: We returned to the next day to 7 Brothers for lunch & told them we received 2 sandwiches but were charged for 1. They told us they appreciated letting them know & told us not to worry about. A delicious jewel in the Big Apple!

originalText.text:
I always order bagel sandwiches form this place. Usually we get bacon, egg,and cheese which are always great. This time I got a everything bagel with veggie cream cheese. They definitely took my order "literally" when they put vegetables directly on top of plain cream cheese.

I'll keep ordering from here, I just wont be getting the veggie cream cheese. Lol

I'll keep ordering from here, I just wont be getting the veggie cream cheese. Lol

originalText.text: I had the plain bagel with cream cheese and scallion. The bagel and cream cheese combination was very good, and the bagel wasn’t too hard or too soft. Excellent place for a quick snack!

text.text: I had the plain bagel with cream cheese and scallion. The bagel and cream cheese combination was very good, and the bagel wasn’t too hard or too soft. Excellent place for a quick snack!
